Uses of Package
org.ingatan.component.image.optionpanes

Packages that use org.ingatan.component.image.optionpanes
org.ingatan.component.image Classes to do with Ingatan's inbuilt image editor, including the image editor itself as ImageEditorPane. 
org.ingatan.component.image.optionpanes Option panes for the tools in the inbuilt image editor. 
 

Classes in org.ingatan.component.image.optionpanes used by org.ingatan.component.image
ArrowOptionPane
          This option pane displays options for drawing arrows - it separates the arrow head option and the line style option into two ThumbnailPanes.
BrightnessContrastOptionPane
          Provides an interface for the user to set the brightness and contrast of the current image or selection.
BucketFillOptionPane
          Provides an interface for the user to set the tolerance of the bucket fill tool.
EraserOptionPane
          This pane provides preset erasers to the user.
LineOptionPane
          Provides a GUI for setting line-style options.
PencilOptionPane
          Provides a selection of brushes on a ThumbnailPane for the user to choose from.
SelectionOptionPane
          This class provides the selection option to the user.
ShapeDrawOptionPane
          Displays all options for drawing shapes.
StampOptionPane
          This is essentially a clip-art library, with the user able to choose from different categories.
 

Classes in org.ingatan.component.image.optionpanes used by org.ingatan.component.image.optionpanes
StampOptionPane.Category
          Encapsulates the name of the category and the filenames to the images that belong to that category.
